(:action create ; Create a resource in a location
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?location - location ?resource - resource)
    :precondition (and
                    (at ?agent ?location)
                    (material_collected ?agent ?resource)
                    (not (resource_created ?location))
                   )
    :effect (and
             (resource_created ?location)
             (not (material_collected ?agent ?resource))

(:action start_fire
    :parameters (?p - person ?m - material)
    :precondition (and
                    (material_collected ?p ?m)
                    (shelter_built beach)
                    (not (fire_started beach))
                   )
    :effect (fire_started beach)
)

(:action wet
    ; Wet an item or put an object in a receptacle
    :parameters (?npc - npc ?item - object ?receptacle - receptacle)
    :precondition (and (at ?npc water-source) (or (dry ?item) (and (holding ?npc ?item) (empty ?receptacle))))
    :effect (and (or (and (wet ?item) (not (dry ?item))
